content.rendered:
Bibledit Video Tutorials

Bibledit has a series of Video Tutorials for the Bible Translation Tools. These are necessary to understand the Bibledit Translation Software, as well as the Demo version of the software.

Watch these videos
here or on the
YouTube Channel of Bibledit

  • 1 How to import Bible text
  • 2 How to edit Bible text
  • 3 How to search
  • 4 How to replace text
  • 5 Organize your Workspace
  • 6 The three Bible text editors
  • 7 Advanced Search
  • 8 Advanced Replace
  • 9 Searching similar verses
  • 10 Searching for Strong’s Numbers
  • 11 Searching for similar Strong’s Numbers
  • 12 Searching for similar Hebrew or Greek words
  • 13 Searching Bibles and Consultation Notes
  • 14 How to use Style Sheets
  • 15 Connect to Bibledit Cloud
  • 16 USFM Resources
  • 17 How to install Resources
  • 18 How to view Resources
  • 19 How to use Image Resources
  • 20 Change Notifications
  • 21 How to double workspace on a small device
  • 22 How to print Resources
  • 23 Checking Sentence Structure
  • 24 Automatic Checks for Translators
  • 25 Automatic Checks for Managers in Bibledit Cloud
  • 26 Giving Public Feedback in Bibledit Cloud
  • 27 You can translate the Bible into your own language

YouTube Video Channel of Bibledit

Home
Installation
Support
